src.java.query

Class Query

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.java.query.Query

  • public class Query
extends java.lang.Object
    An object representation of a query. Stores a query id, a List of it's respective terms and Map of scores to store results for each document.
    Since:
    10-16-2017

      • getResults

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> getResults()
        Returns:
        A Map where the keys are the ids of the documents and the values are the scores of each respective document.

      • getTop10SortedResults

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> getTop10SortedResults()
        Returns:
        Similar to getSortedResults but only results the 10 highest results

      • getSortedResults

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> getSortedResults()
        Returns:
        Similar to getResults but the results are sorted from the highest to lowest score
